Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Well, a teacher depending on their interest, still will be a better source to guide you over a generative AI tool which will provide based on the prompt given

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Yes, GenAI is very robotic and well a teacher understands your emotions and thoughts on a situation as they see you in person and may choose to give you extra aid and support which GenAI possibly can't

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI will not clearly source information given if not asked and whereas a Teacher will 90% of the time source their information to not be misunderstood as copying
